name: Pookie
greetingText: You are the Prettiest Girl in the whole world!
wishText: May the Capybara God always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: You are a beacon of joy, in every space.
replayText: A sunflower, radiant in morning light.
outroSmiley: Wishing you a fantastic year ahead! Keep Smiling:)
